description.para: These macros allow a shader to retrieve messages which have been written to the message bank. If the named message does not exist (has not been written yet?), then false is returned. Otherwise, true indicates a successful read.
Please refer to ai_shader_message.h for a description of the message-reading functions called by these macros.

These macros allow a shader to write messages to the message bank. If the write has failed for some reason (perhaps there are already too many messages in the bank?) then false is returned. Otherwise, true indicates a successful write.
Please refer to ai_shader_message.h for a description of the message-writing functions called by these macros.
These functions let you loop over all available messages for a given sample. This is mainly intended for debugging purposes.

detaileddescription.para: This represents a message iterator. The actual contents of this struct are private.

memberdef.name: AiCreateFuncs
memberdef.initializer: AI_API AI_DEPRECATED bool AiMessageGet##_name##Func (const AtShaderGlobals*, const char*, _type*); \ AI_API bool AiMessageGet##_name##FuncAtString (const AtShaderGlobals*, const AtString, _type*); \ inline bool AiMessageGet##_name##Func (const AtShaderGlobals* sg, const AtString str, _type* x)\ { \ return AiMessageGet##_name##FuncAtString(sg, str, x); \ } \ AI_API AI_DEPRECATED bool AiMessageSet##_name##Func (AtShaderGlobals*, const char*, _type); \ AI_API bool AiMessageSet##_name##FuncAtString (AtShaderGlobals*, const AtString, _type); \ inline bool AiMessageSet##_name##Func (AtShaderGlobals* sg, const AtString str, _type x) \ { \ return AiMessageSet##_name##FuncAtString(sg, str, x); \ }

memberdef.argsstring: (const AtShaderGlobals *sg, const AtString str, unsigned int *x)
memberdef.name: AiMessageGetUIntFunc

memberdef.argsstring: (AtShaderGlobals *sg, const AtString str, unsigned int x)
memberdef.name: AiMessageSetUIntFunc

memberdef.argsstring: (const AtShaderGlobals *sg, const AtString str, const char **x)

detaileddescription.para: Message passing API for shader writers
